name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Senior Reliability Engineer with a robust background in Engineering Solutions and Design Verification, leveraging 13+ years of experience in high-performance application delivery across diverse industries. Proficient in conducting Risk Assessments and ensuring Project Compliance, with a keen understanding of Safety Standards. Demonstrated strength in analytical and problem-solving skills, complemented by effective communication and team collaboration abilities.

Additionally, possesses extensive technical expertise in **JavaScript/TypeScript**, **Python**, **Flutter**, and hands-on experience with both frontend and backend development frameworks including **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**. Skilled in implementing cloud-native systems on **AWS** and **Azure**, alongside building AI/ML-powered platforms utilizing tools like **MLflow**, **Airflow**, and **Kubeflow**. Committed to compliance-driven development adhering to HIPAA, FHIR, PCI DSS, and SOC 2 standards while deploying microservices and event-driven architectures.
